languageKey.label: Dropbox Upload Form
Available Dropbox directories:
API
Dropbox application key: Go to https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps, sign-in and register a new application under "My Apps".
Dropbox application secret
Login email: Email to log into your Dropbox account
Password: Password to log into your Dropbox account
Dropbox directory
OAuth library to use
